mapper.select:
with temp_post_tb as ( select pt.post_id, pt.content, pt.visibility, pt.user_id as pt_user_id, pt.created_at,
ut.user_id, ut.nickname, ut.img_url,
ft.follow_id, ft.follower_id, ft.following_id
from
post_tb pt left outer join user_tb ut on ut.user_id = pt.user_id left outer join follow_tb ft on ft.following_id = pt.user_id and not ft.following_id = #{userId}
where
ft.follower_id = #{userId} or pt.user_id = #{userId}
order by
pt.created_at desc limit #{startIndex}, #{size}),
temp_post_tb2 as (select pt.post_id, pt.content, pt.visibility, pt.user_id as pt_user_id, pt.created_at,
ut.user_id, ut.nickname, ut.img_url,
ft.follow_id, ft.follower_id, ft.following_id
from post_tb pt left outer join user_tb ut on ut.user_id = pt.user_id left outer join follow_tb ft on not ft.following_id = pt.user_id and ft.follower_id = #{userId}
where ft.follower_id is null and pt.visibility = 'Public'
order by rand(), created_at desc limit 0, 2)
select * from temp_post_tb tpt left outer join image_file_tb ift on ift.reference_id = tpt.post_id and ift.category = 'post'
union
select * from temp_post_tb2 tpt2 left outer join image_file_tb ift on ift.reference_id = tpt2.post_id and ift.category = 'post' order by 5 desc;
select count(*) from post_tb pt left outer join follow_tb ft on ft.following_id = pt.user_id where ft.follower_id = #{userId};
